name: different
trans: adj. 不平常；与众不同的；有区别的

sentences.english: The place looks completely different now.
sentences.chinese: 这地方现在完全变了。

sentences.english: They decided to try a radically different approach.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定尝试一种全然不同的办法。

sentences.english: We found women had significantly different political views from men.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现女性的政治观点与男性大不相同。

sentences.english: a slightly different way of doing things
sentences.chinese: 稍有区别的做事方法

sentences.english: What actually happened was subtly different from the PR people’s version.
sentences.chinese: 实际情况与公关部那些人的说法有细微的差别。

sentences.english: The show is refreshingly different from most exhibitions of modern art.
sentences.chinese: 这次展览与大多数现代艺术展不一样，令人耳目一新。

sentences.english: The publishing business is no different from any other business in this respect.
sentences.chinese: 从这一点来讲，出版业和其他任何行业没有什么差别。

sentences.english: It’s a different world here in London.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦这儿的情况完全不同。

detailed_translations.english: not like something or someone else, or not like before

sentences.english: He noticed a woman in a black dress sitting across from him.
sentences.chinese: 他看到有位黑衣女子坐在他的对面。

sentences.english: I didn’t notice any smoke.
sentences.chinese: 我没注意到有烟。

sentences.english: Have you noticed any change in him?
sentences.chinese: 你注意到他有什么变化了吗？

sentences.english: I waved but they took no notice.
sentences.chinese: 我挥了挥手，可是他们没有注意到。

sentences.english: Firefighters were prepared to rush out at a moment’s notice.
sentences.chinese: 消防队员准备着随时出动。

detailed_translations.english: if you notice something or someone, you realize that they exist, especially because you can see, hear, or feel them
when you notice or pay attention to someone or something

sentences.english: You are one of us. You are a swan!
sentences.chinese: 你是我们中的一个。你是一只天鹅！

sentences.english: Hey, you be the swan.
sentences.chinese: 而你是那天鹅。

sentences.english: Toads pursuit of swans, swan disdain said: If I as long as you die!
sentences.chinese: 癞蛤蟆追求天鹅，天鹅不屑地说：我要是长成你这样早去死了！

detailed_translations.english: a large white bird with a long neck that lives on rivers and lakes

sentences.english: Discuss your worries with your partner.
sentences.chinese: 和伴侣谈谈你的忧虑。

sentences.english: Only 29% of lone parents receive financial support from their former partners .
sentences.chinese: 只有29%的单身家长得到他们前配偶的经济资助。

sentences.english: Clare’s my tennis partner.
sentences.chinese: 克莱尔是我的网球搭档。

sentences.english: Take your partners for the next dance.
sentences.chinese: 挑选下一支舞的舞伴吧。

detailed_translations.english: one of two people who are married, or who live together and have a sexual relationship

sentences.english: a slim young woman
sentences.chinese: 身材苗条的年轻女子

sentences.english: a slim waist
sentences.chinese: 纤腰

detailed_translations.chinese: 苗条的；修长的；微小的；差的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is slim is attractively thin
to make yourself thinner by eating less, taking a lot of exercise etc

detailed_translations.chinese: (Slim)人名；(阿拉伯)萨利姆；(英、西)斯利姆

sentences.english: Are you suggesting I’m too fat?
sentences.chinese: 你是不是在说我太胖了？

sentences.english: a short fat man in his early fifties
sentences.chinese: 一个五十岁出头的矮胖男人

sentences.english: You’ll get fat if you eat all that chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 如果你把那些巧克力都吃了，就会变胖的。

sentences.english: He looks much fatter than in his photo.
sentences.chinese: 他看上去比相片上胖多了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 肥的，胖的；油腻的；丰满的
detailed_translations.english: weighing too much because you have too much flesh on your body
a substance that is stored under the skin of people and animals, that helps to keep them warm

sentences.english: long dark curly hair
sentences.chinese: 又长又黑的鬈发

detailed_translations.english: having a lot of curls or a curved shape

sentences.english: a long, straight road
sentences.chinese: 一条笔直的长路

sentences.english: Try to keep your legs straight.
sentences.chinese: 尽量把腿伸直。

sentences.english: Always lift with a straight back.
sentences.chinese: 提东西的时候，一定要把背挺直。

sentences.english: her long, straight black hair
sentences.chinese: 她又长又直的黑发

sentences.english: They sat down in a straight line .
sentences.chinese: 他们坐成一直溜儿。

sentences.english: The road was dead straight (= completely straight ) .
sentences.chinese: 那条路是笔直的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 直的；连续的；笔直的；正直的；整齐的；异性恋的
detailed_translations.english: something that is straight does not bend or curve

detailed_translations.chinese: 直接地；不断地；立即；坦率地
detailed_translations.english: in a level or correct position

detailed_translations.chinese: 直；直线；直男，直女，异性恋者
detailed_translations.english: the straight part of a  racetrack

sentences.english: She was wearing jeans and a T-shirt.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着牛仔裤和T恤衫。

detailed_translations.english: a soft shirt with short  sleeves  and no collar

sentences.english: ...a young man in jeans and a worn T-shirt.
sentences.chinese: …一个穿着牛仔裤和破旧T恤衫的年轻人。

detailed_translations.english: trousers made of denim(= a strong, usually blue, cotton cloth )

sentences.english: He’s a small boy, about John’s size.
sentences.chinese: 他是个小男孩，个子和约翰差不多。

sentences.english: Jensens’ house is about the same size as ours.
sentences.chinese: 詹森的房子和我们的差不多大。

sentences.english: He’s quite a big dog, but he’s still not full size yet.
sentences.chinese: 这条狗体型很大，但还没有长足。

detailed_translations.english: how big or small something is
to sort according to size

sentences.english: What shape is the table?
sentences.chinese: 那张桌子是什么形状的？

sentences.english: You can recognize a tree by the shape of its leaves.
sentences.chinese: 可以根据树叶的形状辨认出是什么树。

sentences.english: His battered old hat had completely lost its shape.
sentences.chinese: 他那顶破旧的帽子已经完全变形了。

sentences.english: The plants grow in every shape and size .
sentences.chinese: 这些植物有各种形状，各种大小。

sentences.english: The children cut out shapes (= squares, triangles etc ) from the piece of cardboard.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们把卡纸片剪成各种形状。

detailed_translations.english: the form that something has, for example round, square,  triangular  etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 形成；塑造，使成形；使符合
detailed_translations.english: to influence something such as a belief, opinion etc and make it develop in a particular way

sentences.english: She had thick black hair and smooth dark skin.
sentences.chinese: 她一头浓密的黑发，皮肤黝黑光滑。

sentences.english: The skin on his hands was dry and rough.
sentences.chinese: 他手上的皮肤干燥粗糙。

detailed_translations.english: the natural outer layer of a person’s or animal’s body
to remove the skin from an animal, fruit, or vegetable

sentences.english: a special place in the classroom for reading
sentences.chinese: 教室里的阅读专区

sentences.english: No one receives special treatment.
sentences.chinese: 没有人享有特殊待遇。

sentences.english: Maria’s special recipe for apple pie
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚的苹果馅饼秘方

sentences.english: The good china was used only on special occasions .
sentences.chinese: 这些精美瓷器只在特殊场合使用。

sentences.english: Each village has its own special charm.
sentences.chinese: 每一座村子都有其独特的魅力。

detailed_translations.english: not ordinary or usual, but different in some way and often better or more important

sentences.english: They wrote various numbers on a large sheet of paper.
sentences.chinese: 他们在一张大纸上写下了很多不同的数字。

sentences.english: Add all the numbers together.
sentences.chinese: 把所有数字加起来。

sentences.english: Answer question number 4.
sentences.chinese: 回答第4题。

detailed_translations.english: a word or sign that represents an amount or a quantity

sentences.english: Natalie was prettier than her sister.
sentences.chinese: 纳塔莉比她姐姐漂亮。

sentences.english: You need that money more than I do.
sentences.chinese: 你比我更需要那笔钱。

sentences.english: There were more people there than I expected.
sentences.chinese: 那里的人比我预想的要多。

sentences.english: If it costs more than $60, I won’t buy it.
sentences.chinese: 如果价格超过60美元，我就不买了。

sentences.english: She had woken even earlier than usual.
sentences.chinese: 她甚至比平时醒得更早。

sentences.english: Divorce is more common than it was a generation ago.
sentences.chinese: 现在离婚比上一代人常见了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比（用于形容词、副词的比较级之后）；除…外（用于other等之后）；与其…（用于 rather等之后）；一…就（用于 no sooner等之后）
detailed_translations.english: used when comparing two things, people, situations etc

name: fair
trans: adj. （头发或皮肤）浅色的；白皙的

sentences.english: a fair maiden
sentences.chinese: 美丽的少女

detailed_translations.english: pleasant and attractive

sentences.english: He has a lot of talent , and his work is fresh and interesting.
sentences.chinese: 他很有天赋，作品新颖有趣。

sentences.english: a persuasive speaker with a natural talent for leadership
sentences.chinese: 有领导天赋、颇有辩才的演说者

sentences.english: His latest book reveals hidden talents.
sentences.chinese: 他最新的一本书展现了他深藏不露的才能。

sentences.english: Sadly, she inherited none of her father’s musical talent.
sentences.chinese: 可惜的是，她一点都没有继承她父亲的音乐天赋。

sentences.english: He is a great talent.
sentences.chinese: 他是个了不起的人才。

sentences.english: Britain’s footballing talent
sentences.chinese: 英国的足球天才

detailed_translations.english: a natural ability to do something well

name: programme
trans: n. 节目单；计划；方案；活动安排

sentences.english: the US space program
sentences.chinese: 美国太空计划

detailed_translations.english: a series of actions which are designed to achieve something important

sentences.english: a huge tiled entrance hall
sentences.chinese: 铺着地砖的大门厅

sentences.english: Each floor had ten rooms on both sides of the hall.
sentences.chinese: 每一层在走廊的两边都各有十个房间。

detailed_translations.english: the area just inside the door of a house or other building, that leads to other rooms

sentences.english: Butterflies and moths are attracted to the wild flowers.
sentences.chinese: 蝴蝶和飞蛾为野花所吸引。

detailed_translations.english: a type of insect that has large wings, often with beautiful colours

sentences.english: He plays the violin in an orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 他在管弦乐队中演奏小提琴。

sentences.english: She is first violin of an orchestra .
sentences.chinese: 她是管弦乐队的第一小提琴手。

sentences.english: All this from playing the violin and the cello.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些都来自于小提琴和大提琴的演奏。

detailed_translations.english: a small wooden musical instrument that you hold under your chin and play by pulling a bow(= special stick ) across the strings

sentences.english: Which country is going to host the next World Cup?
sentences.chinese: 哪个国家将主办下一届世界杯？

detailed_translations.english: to provide the place and everything that is needed for an organized event

sentences.english: a sound understanding of money and banking systems
sentences.chinese: 对货币和银行业体制的透彻理解

sentences.english: a sound knowledge of English
sentences.chinese: 扎实的英语知识

sentences.english: He has sound grasp of European history.
sentences.chinese: 他对欧洲历史有着透彻的理解。

detailed_translations.english: complete and thorough

sentences.english: His playing is technically brilliant, but it doesn’t excite me.
sentences.chinese: 他的演奏技巧娴熟，但并不让我激动。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel happy, interested, or eager

name: exciting
trans: adj. 令人兴奋的；令人激动的

sentences.english: an exciting discovery
sentences.chinese: 激动人心的发现

sentences.english: ‘Julia and Paul are getting married!’ ‘Oh, how exciting!’
sentences.chinese: “朱莉娅和保罗要结婚了！”“啊，太让人兴奋了！”

sentences.english: I’ve got some very exciting news for you.
sentences.chinese: 我给你带来了一些很激动人心的消息。

sentences.english: Let’s do something exciting.
sentences.chinese: 我们来做些让人振奋的事情吧。

sentences.english: Melanie finds her work exciting and rewarding.
sentences.chinese: 梅拉妮觉得自己的工作既刺激又有意义。

detailed_translations.english: making you feel excited

name: anything
trans: pron. 任何东西；任何事物

sentences.english: You can buy anything you want.
sentences.chinese: 你想要什么都可以买。

sentences.english: He was prepared to do anything to make a bit of money.
sentences.chinese: 只要能赚一点钱，他什么都愿意做。

sentences.english: Anything would be better than staying at home!
sentences.chinese: 做什么都比待在家里好！

sentences.english: You can write about swimming, skiing, or anything else you enjoy doing.
sentences.chinese: 你可以写游泳、写滑雪或者其他任何你喜欢的活动。

detailed_translations.english: any thing, event, situation etc, when it is not important to say exactly which

sentences.english: What would you do if someone tried to rob you in the street?
sentences.chinese: 要是有人在街上抢劫你，你会怎么办？

sentences.english: Will someone please explain what’s going on?
sentences.chinese: 谁能说说是怎么回事？

sentences.english: Have Brooks or someone fax this to New York right away.
sentences.chinese: 叫布鲁克斯或谁立刻把这个发传真到纽约。

detailed_translations.english: used to mean a person, when you do not know or do not say who the person is

sentences.english: a big bass drum
sentences.chinese: 一面低音大鼓

sentences.english: 1,000 people marched, beating drums and carrying flags.
sentences.chinese: 1,000人打着鼓扛着旗游行。

sentences.english: Jones played the drums in an all-girl band.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯在一个女子乐队里打鼓。

sentences.english: a brake drum
sentences.chinese: 制动鼓

sentences.english: a 5 gallon oil drum
sentences.chinese: 5加仑的油桶

detailed_translations.english: a musical instrument made of skin stretched over a circular frame, played by hitting it with your hand or a stick

name: voice
trans: n. 嗓音；说话声；歌唱声

sentences.english: He recognized her voice instantly.
sentences.chinese: 他立刻听出了她的声音。

sentences.english: I could hear angry voices.
sentences.chinese: 我听到了愤怒的声音。

detailed_translations.english: the sounds that you make when you speak, or the ability to make these sounds
to tell people your opinions or feelings about a particular subject

sentences.english: He was a very nice person, always pleasant and friendly.
sentences.chinese: 他是个很好的人，始终彬彬有礼。

sentences.english: The only person who really said anything helpful was Jack.
sentences.chinese: 只有一个人真正说了些有用的话，就是杰克。

sentences.english: I like her as a person , but not as a boss.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢她这个人，但作为老板我就不喜欢了。

sentences.english: I still know quite a lot of people in the village.
sentences.chinese: 我仍然认识村里的很多人。

sentences.english: a group of young people
sentences.chinese: 一群年轻人

sentences.english: You have to sign for it in person.
sentences.chinese: 你必须亲自签收。

detailed_translations.english: a human being, especially considered as someone with their own particular character

sentences.english: What are your hobbies?
sentences.chinese: 你有些什么爱好？

sentences.english: Susan’s hobbies include reading, cooking, and drama.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊的业余爱好包括阅读、烹饪和戏剧。

sentences.english: Retirement gave him the time to pursue his hobbies.
sentences.chinese: 退休以后他有充裕的时间来做自己喜欢做的事。

detailed_translations.english: an activity that you enjoy doing in your free time

sentences.english: Despite their different personalities, they became the best of friends.
sentences.chinese: 尽管个性不同，他们还是成了最好的朋友。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, the illness can lead to changes in personality.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的是，这种病会导致性格变化。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s character, especially the way they behave towards other people

sentences.english: the ability to walk
sentences.chinese: 行走的能力

sentences.english: The test measures your mathematical ability.
sentences.chinese: 这种测试考查的是数学能力。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being able to do something

sentences.english: Her easy-going nature made her popular.
sentences.chinese: 她生性随和，人缘很好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 脾气随和的， 心平气和的； 随便的
detailed_translations.english: not easily upset, annoyed, or worried

sentences.english: Rick accepted her offer of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 她请里克喝咖啡，他接受了。

sentences.english: He accepted the invitation to stay with us.
sentences.chinese: 他接受了邀请来我们家住。

sentences.english: His school reports said that he is always ready to accept a challenge (=  agree to do something difficult  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的学业报告上说他乐于接受挑战。

sentences.english: Please accept this small gift.
sentences.chinese: 请收下这份小小的礼物。

sentences.english: They offered me a job and I accepted.
sentences.chinese: 他们给我一份工作，我接受了。

sentences.english: He readily accepted her invitation (=  accepted it quickly  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他欣然接受了她的邀请。

detailed_translations.english: to take something that someone offers you, or to agree to do something that someone asks you to do

sentences.english: Each pea and peach on the beach can be reached by the peacock.
sentences.chinese: 海滩上的每一颗豌豆和桃子孔雀都能触及.

sentences.english: In the evening breeze her pet peacock sat drowsing on its perch, and the pigeons were silent in their corner.
sentences.chinese: 在黄昏的微风中，她宠爱的孔雀蹬在栖木上打睡瞌，她的鸽子沉默地站在它们的角落里。

detailed_translations.english: a large bird, the male of which has long blue and green tail feathers that it can lift up and spread out

name: wise
trans: adj. 充满智慧的；明智的

sentences.english: a wise precaution
sentences.chinese: 明智的预防措施

sentences.english: I don’t think that would be a very wise move (= not be a sensible thing to do ).
sentences.chinese: 我认为那样做不是很明智。

detailed_translations.english: wise decisions and actions are sensible and based on good judgment

sentences.english: I looked out for you as a nightingale looks out for the cherry garden, - sighed the sixth.
sentences.chinese: 第六个女儿喊道：“我就像夜莺盼望着樱花园一样，整天张望着您。”

detailed_translations.english: a small bird that sings very beautifully, especially at night

sentences.english: After the storm we were without electricity for five days.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨之后我们断电了五天。

sentences.english: a house without a garden
sentences.chinese: 不带花园的房子

sentences.english: We passed two ruined abbeys, one with a tower and one without.
sentences.chinese: 我们路过两座破落的寺院，一座有塔楼，另一座没有。

sentences.english: I’m getting used to managing without a car.
sentences.chinese: 我已经习惯没有汽车了。

detailed_translations.english: not having something, especially something that is basic or necessary

detailed_translations.chinese: 户外；在外面；没有或不显示某事物

sentences.english: There was still one little nagging doubt at the back of his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他的心头仍有一丝挥之不去的疑虑。

sentences.english: Kim never doubted his story.
sentences.chinese: 例句：金对于他讲的事情从不怀疑。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of being not sure whether something is true or right
to think that something may not be true or that it is unlikely

sentences.english: Maria looked at him and laughed.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚看着他大笑起来。

sentences.english: Tony was laughing so hard he had to steady himself on the table.
sentences.chinese: 托尼笑得太厉害了，靠着桌子才能让自己站稳。

sentences.english: Nora laughed so much that she nearly cried.
sentences.chinese: 诺拉笑得眼泪都快出来了。

sentences.english: He couldn’t help it; he burst out laughing (= suddenly started laughing ).
sentences.chinese: 他情不自禁地放声大笑起来。

sentences.english: He’s one of the few writers who can make me laugh out loud.
sentences.chinese: 有几位作家能让我放声大笑，他是其中之一。

sentences.english: He gave a short laugh.
sentences.chinese: 他笑了一声。

detailed_translations.english: to make sounds with your voice, usually while you are smiling, because you think something is funny
the act of laughing or the sound you make when you laugh

sentences.english: her smiling face
sentences.chinese: 她的笑脸

detailed_translations.english: to make your mouth curve upwards, in order to be friendly or because you are happy or amused
an expression in which your mouth curves upwards, when you are being friendly or are happy or amused

sentences.english: an ostrich feather
sentences.chinese: 一根鸵鸟羽毛

detailed_translations.english: one of the light soft things that cover a bird’s body

name: colourful
trans: adj. 颜色鲜艳的；五彩缤纷的

sentences.english: a colourful display of flowers
sentences.chinese: 一片五彩缤纷的鲜花

sentences.english: colorful costumes
sentences.chinese: 色彩鲜艳的服装

sentences.chinese: 天太暗，无法继续寻找。

sentences.chinese: 飞机降落在希思罗机场。

sentences.chinese: 工程师们面临的主要难题是要确定该地区地下河的位置。

sentences.chinese: 他住在威尔士北部。

sentences.chinese: 呃，实际上这需要相当多的工作和研究。

sentences.chinese: 我们享受了三天的春日阳光。

detailed_translations.english: the light and heat that come from the sun when there is no cloud

sentences.chinese: 这是那种你要么喜欢要么讨厌的电影。

sentences.english: He hates his job.
sentences.chinese: 他讨厌自己的工作。

detailed_translations.english: to dislike something very much

sentences.chinese: 许多农村地区仍处于赤贫状态。

sentences.english: extreme cold

sentences.chinese: 他费了极大的劲找配料。

trans: n. 媒体对重要事情的报道；新闻

sentences.chinese: 我希望很快就能给你好消息。

sentences.chinese: 冰需要热才能融化。

to make something become warm or hot

sentences.chinese: 迪伊凝视着拍岸的波涛。

sentences.chinese: 我有几个理由来支持我的观点。

sentences.chinese: 据官方记录，去年有五人在那个路口附近丧生。

sentences.chinese: 他的经历说明他个性坚强。

sentences.chinese: 我们深夜到达伦敦。

sentences.chinese: 她伸手从包里取出一张名片。

sentences.chinese: 战争爆发时他29岁。

name: area
trans: n. (地方、城市、国家、世界的)地区，地域

sentences.chinese: 只有这个地区出产的干酪才能被称作“罗克福尔干酪”。

sentences.chinese: 城镇地区的犯罪率要高很多。

sentences.chinese: 2,000平方英里的面积

sentences.chinese: 这门课程涵盖三大学科领域。

sentences.chinese: 该飞机开始沿跑道滑行。

detailed_translations.english: into or inside a building

sentences.chinese: 叶子大而油亮的开花灌木

sentences.chinese: 首先，我们需要了解案子的相关事实。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of information that is known to be true

sentences.chinese: 我跟市长很熟，事实上，我上周还和她一起吃过饭呢。

sentences.chinese: 普通的美国人甚至还没有想过明年的选举。

sentences.chinese: 平常我每周开车约250英里。

sentences.chinese: 该世纪上半叶，人口大幅度增加。

sentences.chinese: 来这里的参观者自5月起已增至原来的三倍。

sentences.english: an increase in spending

sentences.chinese: 往火里加点煤。

sentences.chinese: 采煤业

sentences.english: a lump of coal
sentences.chinese: 一块煤

sentences.chinese: 查明起火原因是我们的责任。

sentences.chinese: 不必惊慌。

sentences.chinese: 我父亲为民族党的事业而奋斗。

trans: adj. (bad的比较级)更差的；更糟的

sentences.chinese: 今年天气糟糕得多。

sentences.chinese: 这条路修了好几年。

sentences.chinese: 爸爸在梯子上修补屋顶。

sentences.chinese: 哪儿能修补鞋子？

sentences.english: The church tower is in need of repair.
sentences.chinese: 教堂的塔楼需要修缮。

sentences.chinese: 他打开纸板箱把里面的物品一一拿出来。

sentences.chinese: 这家商店正在减价出售家具和家居用品。

sentences.chinese: 这瓶1965年生产的原装酒现在是收藏品。

detailed_translations.english: a single thing, especially one thing in a list, group, or set of things

sentences.chinese: 大多数受害者都出现了这样那样的心理问题。

sentences.chinese: 他们供应汉堡包、比萨饼什么的。

sentences.english: The eggs are sorted according to size.
sentences.chinese: 这些鸡蛋是按大小分类的。

sentences.chinese: 用一块湿布清洗表面。

detailed_translations.english: material used for making things such as clothes

sentences.chinese: 这种古罗马瑞士军刀包含了刀，勺，叉，长钉，抹刀和小鹤嘴锄。

sentences.chinese: 她正要去父母家为奥斯卡取几件干净的衣服。

sentences.english: a plastic spoon
sentences.chinese: 塑料汤匙

sentences.english: plastic bags
sentences.chinese: 塑料袋

detailed_translations.english: made of plastic

sentences.chinese: 政府支出方面的过度浪费

detailed_translations.chinese: 浪费；废物；荒地；损耗；地面风化物

waste materials, substances etc are unwanted because the good part of them has been removed

sentences.english: The farm was very isolated, but it had electricity.
sentences.chinese: 那个农场非常偏远，但有电力供应。

detailed_translations.english: the power that is carried by wires, cables etc, and is used to provide light or heat, to make machines work etc

sentences.chinese: 她觉得有人轻轻拍了拍她的肩膀。

sentences.english: I went up and tapped on the window.
sentences.chinese: 我走上去轻轻敲敲窗户。

detailed_translations.english: an act of hitting something lightly, especially to get someone’s attention
to hit your fingers lightly on something, for example to get someone’s attention

name: brush
trans: v. (用刷子)刷净，刷亮，刷平顺

sentences.chinese: 硬毛刷，板刷

detailed_translations.english: an object that you use for cleaning, painting, making your hair tidy etc, made with a lot of hairs,  bristle s  , or thin pieces of plastic, fastened to a handle

sentences.chinese: 糖对牙齿不好。

detailed_translations.english: one of the hard white objects in your mouth that you use to bite and eat food

sentences.chinese: 把你的垃圾放进箱子。

sentences.chinese: 可是你知道的，对我们人类来说，你以为某件事物很好、你仔细分析它、细看它一次又一次，不相信你的好运，最后又把它丢到「不」的箱子里（不再理它），这真是很消极又愚蠢的。

sentences.chinese: 我们要是开车去，可以节省很多时间。

sentences.english: Everyone is being encouraged to save energy.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都被鼓励节约能源。

sentences.chinese: 节省取暖费的种种办法

sentences.chinese: 油和水不相融。

trans: adj. 可重复使用的；可再次使用的

sentences.english: Store refrigerated food in reusable containers rather than in plastic wrap or aluminium foil.
sentences.chinese: 用可再用容器而不是保鲜膜或铝箔纸来储存冷冻食品。

detailed_translations.english: Things that are reusable can be used more than once

sentences.chinese: 在圣诞节期间，商店营业到很晚。

sentences.english: a store of wood
sentences.chinese: 木料储备

detailed_translations.english: a place where goods are sold to the public. In British English, a store is large and sells many different things, but in American English, a store can be large or small, and sell many things or only one type of thing.

name: even
trans: adv. (强调出乎意料)甚至，连，即使

sentences.chinese: 大多数公司的利润都出现下滑，甚至连很大的公司也不例外。

sentences.chinese: 这很难看得见，即使开着灯也没有用。

sentences.chinese: 她甚至连电话都没打给我们。

sentences.english: He never even acknowledged my letter.
sentences.chinese: 他收到我的信甚至从不会告知一声。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize something that is unexpected or surprising in what you are saying

name: huge
trans: adj. 巨大的；极多的；程度高的

sentences.english: a huge dog
sentences.chinese: 一条大狗

sentences.english: huge crowds
sentences.chinese: 大群大群的人

sentences.english: Your room’s huge compared to mine.
sentences.chinese: 你的房间跟我的比很大。

sentences.english: These shoes make my feet look huge.
sentences.chinese: 这双鞋让我的脚看上去大极了。

sentences.english: the huge scale of the problem
sentences.chinese: 该问题的严重性

detailed_translations.english: extremely large in size, amount, or degree

sentences.english: The Government are planning further cuts in public spending.
sentences.chinese: 政府正计划进一步削减公共支出。

sentences.english: The US government has tightened restrictions on firearms.
sentences.chinese: 美国政府已经加强了对枪支的管制。

sentences.english: Neither party had the majority necessary to form a government.
sentences.chinese: 两个政党都没有获得组阁所必需的多数票。

sentences.english: strong government
sentences.chinese: 强有力的统治

detailed_translations.english: the group of people who govern a country or state

sentences.english: I want to thank everyone who has encouraged and supported me.
sentences.chinese: 我要感谢每一位鼓励和支持过我的人。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone the courage or confidence to do something

sentences.english: We have to show that publishing this story is in the public interest (= helpful or useful to ordinary people ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们必须证明刊登这篇报道有利于公众。

sentences.english: full public access to information
sentences.chinese: 公众对信息的充分知情权

sentences.english: Public opinion is gradually shifting in favor of the imprisoned men.
sentences.chinese: 舆论渐渐倾向于同情入狱的男子。

sentences.english: There was a public outcry (= expression of anger by a lot of people ) about the shooting.
sentences.chinese: 公众就枪击事件发出了强烈抗议。

sentences.english: Their activities have been hidden from the public gaze (= people’s eyes or attention ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的活动一直在避开公众的视线。

sentences.english: He is adored by his public.
sentences.chinese: 他深受支持者喜爱。

detailed_translations.english: relating to all the ordinary people in a country, who are not members of the government or do not have important jobs
ordinary people who do not work for the government or have any special position in society

name: transport
trans: n. 交通车辆；旅行方式

sentences.english: trucks used for transporting oil
sentences.chinese: 运输石油的卡车

sentences.english: Canals were used for the transport of goods.
sentences.chinese: 利用运河来运输货物。

detailed_translations.english: to take goods, people etc from one place to another in a vehicle
the process or business of taking goods from one place to another

sentences.english: the environmental damage caused by the chemical industry
sentences.chinese: 化学工业对环境造成的破坏

sentences.english: an international meeting to discuss environmental issues
sentences.chinese: 探讨环境问题的国际会议

sentences.english: the environmental impact of pollution from cars
sentences.chinese: 汽车造成的污染对环境的影响

sentences.english: an environmental group
sentences.chinese: 环境保护组织

detailed_translations.english: concerning or affecting the air, land, or water on Earth

sentences.english: an electric blanket
sentences.chinese: 电热毯

detailed_translations.english: needing electricity to work, produced by electricity, or used for carrying electricity

sentences.english: The offices are on the top two floors of the building.
sentences.chinese: 办公室在大楼最高的两层。

sentences.english: a farmhouse and other farm buildings
sentences.chinese: 农舍以及其他的农场建筑

sentences.english: There is a limited supply of land for building.
sentences.chinese: 建筑用地供应有限。

detailed_translations.english: a structure such as a house, church, or factory, that has a roof and walls

name: low
trans: adj. 低于平均水平的；低的；矮的

sentences.english: a low wall/building/table
sentences.chinese: 矮墙 / 建筑物 / 桌子

sentences.english: low clouds
sentences.chinese: 低云

sentences.english: jobs with low status
sentences.chinese: 社会地位低下的职业

detailed_translations.english: not high or tall

sentences.chinese: 那些孩子哪来这么多精力？

sentences.english: I really put a lot of energy into what I do.
sentences.chinese: 我做起事来总是投入很大精力。

sentences.english: kinetic energy
sentences.chinese: 动能

detailed_translations.english: the physical and mental strength that makes you able to do things

sentences.english: This is a cheap and simple process. However, there are dangers.
sentences.chinese: 这是个花钱少而又简单的方法，不过有危险。

sentences.english: an extremely unpleasant disease that is, however, easy to treat
sentences.chinese: 一种让人极其难受却容易治疗的病

sentences.english: However you look at it, it's going to cost a lot.
sentences.chinese: 不管你怎么看，它都要花很多钱。

detailed_translations.english: used when you are adding a fact or piece of information that seems surprising, or seems very different from what you have just said

sentences.english: She lives alone.
sentences.chinese: 她一个人生活。

sentences.english: You shouldn’t leave a child alone in the house.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该把小孩独自留在家里。

sentences.english: My wife and I like to spend time alone together away from the kids.
sentences.chinese: 我和妻子喜欢没有孩子打扰，过二人世界。

sentences.chinese: 她现在已经独自在这所房子里住了差不多五年了。

without any help from other people

sentences.english: The picture shows six of the nine planets in the solar system.
sentences.chinese: 这张图片展示太阳系9个行星中的6个行星。

detailed_translations.english: A planet is a large, round object in space that moves around a star. The Earth is a planet.

sentences.english: Since earliest times, mankind has been fascinated by fire.
sentences.chinese: 人类自远古以来就对火很感兴趣。

sentences.english: one of the most important events in the history of mankind
sentences.chinese: 人类历史上最重要的事件之一

detailed_translations.english: all humans considered as a group

sentences.english: daily flights to Miami
sentences.chinese: 每日飞往迈阿密的航班

sentences.english: China Daily receives dispatches from all parts of the world.
sentences.chinese: 《中国日报》收到世界各地发来的电讯。

detailed_translations.english: happening or done every day
a newspaper that is printed and sold every day, or every day except Sunday

sentences.english: He is a scientist of high prestige.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位有声望的科学家。

sentences.english: As a scientist,he disbelieves in Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 作为一名科学家，他不信耶稣。

sentences.english: The scientist thirsts after an achievement.
sentences.chinese: 这名科学家渴望取得成就。

detailed_translations.english: someone who works or is trained in science

sentences.chinese: 我觉得很难适应变化。

sentences.chinese: 为气候变化感到担忧的科学家们

sentences.chinese: 十几岁的孩子如果性格上发生了变化，可能意味着有吸毒问题。

sentences.english: No major changes were made to the book.
sentences.chinese: 这本书没有大的修改。

sentences.english: She had a change of heart (= change in attitude ) and decided to stay.
sentences.chinese: 她改变主意，决定留下来。

sentences.english: Family life has undergone dramatic change in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来家庭生活发生了巨大的变化。

sentences.chinese: 马特把口袋里所有的零钱都掏了出来。

detailed_translations.english: the process or result of something or someone becoming different

sentences.english: The first edition was published in 1765.
sentences.chinese: 第一版于1765年出版。

sentences.english: They are publishing the dictionary on CD-ROM.
sentences.chinese: 那部词典他们将以光盘版的形式推出。

sentences.chinese: 我们喜欢阅读大家的来信，并且会尽量刊登出来。

sentences.chinese: 最新的失业数字将于明天公布。

sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德理论对心理学产生过巨大影响。

detailed_translations.english: an idea or set of ideas that is intended to explain something about life or the world, especially an idea that has not yet been proved to be true

sentences.english: Alexander Graham Bell invented the telephone in 1876.
sentences.chinese: 亚历山大 · 格雷厄姆 · 贝尔于1876年发明了电话。

detailed_translations.english: to make, design, or think of a new type of thing

sentences.chinese: 可供选择的各种价格公道的葡萄酒

sentences.english: Painting is a relatively inexpensive way to enhance your home.
sentences.chinese: 粉刷是美化居室的一种相对较便宜的方式。

detailed_translations.english: cheap – use this to show approval

sentences.english: a 100-watt bulb
sentences.chinese: 一个100瓦的灯泡

detailed_translations.english: the glass part of an electric light, that the light shines from

sentences.chinese: 尸体是在一块田地里找到的。

sentences.english: Forest Service crews often discover campfires that have not been put out completely.
sentences.chinese: 林务局工作人员常常发现未完全熄灭的营火。

detailed_translations.english: to find someone or something, either by accident or because you were looking for them

name: general
trans: adj. 全体的；普遍的；总的

sentences.english: There has been a general decline in standards.
sentences.chinese: 道德水准普遍下降。

sentences.english: ways to improve your general health
sentences.chinese: 全面提高身体素质的方法

sentences.english: There is one exception to this general principle.
sentences.chinese: 这个一般性原则有一例外

sentences.english: a four-star general
sentences.chinese: 四星上将

detailed_translations.english: affecting all or most people, places or things
an officer of very high rank in the army or air force

sentences.chinese: 我的眼睛被烟熏得发痛。

detailed_translations.english: to feel a sharp stinging pain in a part of your body

sentences.english: Alexander Graham Bell, the inventor of the telephone
sentences.chinese: 亚历山大·格雷厄姆·贝尔，电话的发明者

detailed_translations.english: someone who has invented something, or whose job is to invent things

sentences.chinese: 她以前从未见过活生生的大象。

sentences.english: a coat made of real fur
sentences.chinese: 真皮大衣

sentences.english: Things don’t happen quite that easily in real life.
sentences.chinese: 现实生活中不会动不动就有这样的事情发生。

sentences.chinese: 我是爱莫能助啊。

sentences.chinese: 那艘船只能任凭强大的暴风雨肆虐。

sentences.english: The Secretary of State has the power to approve the proposals.
sentences.chinese: 国务卿有权批准这些提议。

sentences.chinese: 4的3次方是4^3。

sentences.chinese: 他1985年去世，终年76岁。

sentences.chinese: 她年仅10岁时父亲突然死于一场意外事故。

sentences.chinese: 她在睡眠中安然辞世，享年98岁。

sentences.chinese: 子弹穿过他的头部，他当场死亡。

name: successful
trans: adj. 达到目的的；有成效的；获得成功的

sentences.english: The operation was successful.
sentences.chinese: 手术成功了。

sentences.english: a highly successful (= very successful ) meeting
sentences.chinese: 十分成功的会议

sentences.chinese: 电脑的发明使商界发生了根本变化。

sentences.chinese: 他们后来承认他们说的纯属虚构。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发明，创造；捏造， 假话

sentences.chinese: 共同基金对小额储户很有吸引力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 救助者；节俭的人；节约装置

sentences.english: Medicines should be kept out of the reach of children.
sentences.chinese: 药应放在孩子够不到的地方。

sentences.english: She studied medicine at Johns Hopkins University.
sentences.chinese: 她曾在约翰•霍普金斯大学学医。

sentences.english: the remarkable achievements of modern medicine
sentences.chinese: 现代医学的非凡成就

detailed_translations.english: a substance used for treating illness, especially a liquid you drink

sentences.english: I can’t afford to spend any more money this week.
sentences.chinese: 这星期我没有能力花更多的钱了。

sentences.english: The repairs cost a lot, but it’s money well spent (= a sensible way of spending money ) .
sentences.chinese: 修理费很高，但这是该花的钱。

detailed_translations.english: to use your money to pay for goods or services

sentences.chinese: 他母亲病得很重。

sentences.english: Maria can’t come in today because she’s sick.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚因为生病今天不能来了。

sentences.english: a sick child
sentences.chinese: 生病的孩子

sentences.english: a sick animal
sentences.chinese: 患病的动物

sentences.chinese: 假如你生病或是去世了，公司怎么办？

sentences.chinese: 他病倒后一周就去世了。

sentences.chinese: 皮特卧床在家，病得很重。

detailed_translations.english: suffering from a disease or illness
people who are ill

sentences.chinese: 我觉得我们都被青霉素愚弄了。

sentences.chinese: 我应当让他给我打一针青霉素的。

sentences.chinese: 这确实加快了青霉素作为抗生素的发展。

detailed_translations.english: a type of medicine that is used to treat infections caused by  bacteria

sentences.english: A British soldier was wounded in the fighting.
sentences.chinese: 战斗中，有一名英国士兵受了伤。

sentences.english: an enemy soldier
sentences.chinese: 敌兵

detailed_translations.chinese: 军人；[昆] 兵蚁；懒汉；一片烤面包
detailed_translations.english: a member of the army of a country, especially someone who is not an officer

detailed_translations.chinese: 当兵；磨洋工；坚持干；假称害病

sentences.chinese: 我已经没有了胃口。

sentences.english: Try not to lose heart (= become sad and hopeless ) - there are plenty of other jobs.
sentences.chinese: 不要灰心―还有很多其他的工作。

sentences.chinese: 救护车赶到时，道格拉斯已经失去知觉。

sentences.english: I followed her on foot, but lost her in the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 我走在她后面，可是在人群中跟丢了。

sentences.english: Klinger lost his seat in the election.
sentences.chinese: 克林格在选举中失去了他的席位。

detailed_translations.english: to stop having a particular attitude, quality, ability etc, or to gradually have less of it

sentences.english: I really admire the way she brings up those kids all on her own.
sentences.chinese: 我十分佩服她独力把那些孩子抚养大。

sentences.chinese: 在菜肴上撒些切碎的新鲜香草。

detailed_translations.english: a small plant that is used to improve the taste of food, or to make medicine

sentences.english: He craved the teacher's pardon.
sentences.chinese: 他恳求老师原谅他。

sentences.chinese: 我恳切地请求你原谅。

sentences.chinese: 我希望你原谅我这样做。

detailed_translations.english: to forgive someone for behaving badly
used to say ‘sorry’ after you have made an impolite sound such as a  burp

sentences.english: The pain is getting worse.
sentences.chinese: 疼得越来越厉害了。

sentences.english: Greg was in a lot of pain.
sentences.chinese: 格雷格疼痛万分。

sentences.chinese: 变老的苦与乐

detailed_translations.english: the feeling you have when part of your body hurts

sentences.chinese: 她一再恳求，后来他们终于同意了。

sentences.english: She fought back the sudden urge to run to him and beg his forgiveness.
sentences.chinese: 她突然很想冲上去请求他原谅，但是她忍住了。

detailed_translations.english: to ask for something in an anxious or urgent way, because you want it very much

sentences.chinese: 他是第一个将凯尔特说书人讲的故事记载下来的人。

sentences.chinese: 你需要给这首诗润色一下。

sentences.english: The poem was all the rage then.
sentences.chinese: 这首诗在当时十分流行。

sentences.english: His poem compares poorly with yours.
sentences.chinese: 他的诗做得不如你的好。

sentences.chinese: 公司解雇他做得对。

sentences.chinese: 陪审团裁定沃克的行为属于自卫。

sentences.english: Politicians will only act when enough people demand that they do something.
sentences.chinese: 只有足够多的民众起来要求，政客们才会采取行动。

sentences.english: The padding acts as a cushion if the player falls or is hit by the ball.
sentences.chinese: 万一球员摔倒或者被球击中，衬垫可以起到缓冲作用。

sentences.chinese: 新总统的第一步行动应当是结束战争。

detailed_translations.english: to do something in a particular way or for a particular reason
one thing that you do

sentences.chinese: 她家穷得甚至买不起新衣服给她。

sentences.chinese: 穷人居住区

sentences.english: one of the poorest countries in the world
sentences.chinese: 世界上最贫穷的国家之一

sentences.english: a poor part of Chicago (= where a lot of poor people live )
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥的一个贫民区

sentences.english: My grandparents grew up dirt poor (= very poor ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的祖父母在赤贫的环境里长大。

sentences.english: The country is poor in natural resources.
sentences.chinese: 该国自然资源匮乏。

detailed_translations.english: having very little money and not many possessions

sentences.chinese: 悲剧发生在他们夜里外出归来的路上。

sentences.english: Tragedy struck the family when their two-year-old son was killed in an accident.
sentences.chinese: 悲剧降临到这个家庭，他们两岁的儿子在一次事故中丧生。

detailed_translations.english: a very sad event, that shocks people because it involves death

sentences.english: Some people believe the universe was created by a big explosion.
sentences.chinese: 有些人认为宇宙是通过一次大爆炸创造出来的。

sentences.english: Her behaviour is creating a lot of problems.
sentences.chinese: 她的行为引起了很多问题。

sentences.english: The new factory is expected to create more than 400 new jobs.
sentences.chinese: 这家新工厂预计能创造400多个新的就业机会。

sentences.english: The announcement only succeeded in creating confusion.
sentences.chinese: 那通告反而引起了混乱。

detailed_translations.english: to make something exist that did not exist before

sentences.english: He has a cheerful but quiet character.
sentences.chinese: 他的性格乐观文静。

sentences.english: Everyone recognizes Disney’s cartoon characters.
sentences.chinese: 迪士尼的卡通人物尽人皆知。

sentences.english: The whole character of the school has changed.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校的特色已经完全变了。

detailed_translations.english: the particular combination of qualities that makes someone a particular type of person

sentences.english: We’re getting to the stage where we hardly ever go out together.
sentences.chinese: 我们快要到几乎不一起外出的地步了。

sentences.english: She is on stage for most of the play.
sentences.chinese: 这出戏的大部分时间里她都在台上

detailed_translations.english: a particular time or state that something reaches as it grows or develops

sentences.english: The book sold more than a million copies.
sentences.chinese: 这本书售出了一百多万册。

sentences.english: I’ve got a million ideas.
sentences.chinese: 我主意多得很。

detailed_translations.english: the number 1,000,000
an extremely large number of people or things

sentences.english: But even in this "concertinaed" timeline - extending millions of centuries into the future, as well as into the past - this century is special.
sentences.chinese: 不过，即使在这张向未来、向过去延伸数百万世纪的“折叠式”时间表上，本世纪也是特别的一个世纪。

sentences.english: The kitten is mainly white with black marks on her back.
sentences.chinese: 小猫身体基本为白色，背上有黑色斑点。

sentences.english: Make a mark at the bottom of the page.
sentences.chinese: 在页末做个记号。

sentences.english: A simple wooden cross marked her grave.
sentences.chinese: 一个简单的木十字架标出了她坟墓的位置。

detailed_translations.english: a small area of darker or lighter colour on a plain surface such as a person’s skin or an animal’s fur
to show where something is

sentences.english: Your arms should be at the same level as your desk.
sentences.chinese: 手臂应该与桌子齐平。

sentences.english: The floors in the old house were not completely level.
sentences.chinese: 老房子的地面不是完全平整的。

detailed_translations.english: the height of something in relation to the ground or to another object
flat and not sloping in any direction

sentences.english: The ticket is valid until March.
sentences.chinese: 这张票的有效期一直到 3 月份。

sentences.english: He waited until she had finished speaking.
sentences.chinese: 他一直等到她讲完。

sentences.english: Until recently, Anna worked as a teacher in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近，安娜一直在日本当老师。

sentences.english: Up until last year, they didn’t even own a car.
sentences.chinese: 一直到去年，他们连汽车也没有。

detailed_translations.english: if something happens until a particular time, it continues and then stops at that time
if something happens until a particular time, it continues and then stops at that time

sentences.english: The young birds weigh only a few grams.
sentences.chinese: 雏鸟重量只有几克。

sentences.english: Do you know how much it weighs?
sentences.chinese: 你知道它的重量吗？

sentences.english: (= how much ) do you weigh?
sentences.chinese: 你的体重是多少？

sentences.english: The box was full of books and weighed a ton (= was very heavy ).
sentences.chinese: 这箱子里放满了书，重得很。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular weight

sentences.english: The average weight of a baby at birth is just over seven pounds.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿的平均出生体重是七磅多一点。

sentences.english: It can be sewn into curtain hems to weight the curtain and so allow it to hang better.
sentences.chinese: 可以把它缝在窗帘的摺边里以增加窗帘的重量，使之更有下垂感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重量，重力；负担；砝码；重要性
detailed_translations.english: how heavy something is when you measure it
If you weight something, you make it heavier by adding something to it, for example, in order to stop it from moving easily

sentences.english: a 29-cent stamp
sentences.chinese: 一枚 29 美分的邮票

sentences.english: Richard collects stamps.
sentences.chinese: 理查德集邮。

sentences.english: a second-class stamp
sentences.chinese: 一张二类邮件的邮票

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of paper that you buy and stick onto an envelope or package before posting it

detailed_translations.chinese: 铭记；标出；盖章于…；贴邮票于…；用脚踩踏
detailed_translations.english: to put your foot down onto the ground loudly and with a lot of force
